contents:
I’m a Cyber Security Engineer at MITRE. I work on projects like MITRE ATT&CK on supporting macOS additions to the knowledge base. I graduated with a B.S. in Cyber Operations and a M.S. in Computer Science from Dakota State University.
I enjoy adversary emulation and purple teaming.
 I currently live in the Washington D.C. - Baltimore area with my cat.
I spend my free time doing creative hobbies, such as painting, writing, drawing, etc. I love reading, especially in the fantasy genre.
title: About Ivy
